metatags.og:title: Movement for Black Lives: Feds Targeted BLM Protesters
metatags.og:description: The federal government deliberately targeted Black Lives Matter protesters via heavy-handed criminal prosecutions in an attempt to disrupt and discourage the global movement that swept the nation last summer in the wake of the Minneapolis police killing of George Floyd, according to a new report.
